reviews.review: No hace falta presentar la mítica saga de HL pero en esta es la primera expansión para el ya tan querido HL2, continua con la historia de su protagonista Gordon Freeman y ahora contando con la compañía de Alyx Vance, cuenta con 13 logros, unos imperdible de la trama y otros un tanto complicados pero no imposibles (uno de los mas interesantes es terminar el juego con solo disparar 1 bala) y es lo que lo hace interesante, un juego imperdible para los fans de la saga, de los Shooters y de las tramas de Ciencia Ficción

I played the original Half-Life over a year ago, and I loved it. The high speed, arcadey design meant that, even with its age, the core gameplay still held up. Riding the wave of Half-Life Alyx hype, I decided to revisit the series with Half-Life 2. The game went in a more narrative direction than the original and many of the cutting edge features the game launched with are commonplace in modern gaming. Despite this, I found the game had fantastic pacing and always kept things fresh. The game hit a really good rhythm for me all the way till the end. 

I wish I could say that the flow was maintained and built upon in episode 1, but that is not the case. The game not only pulls a 180 on the cliffhanger from the last game, but also strips you of all of your weapons you worked so hard to obtain, leaving you with just the gravity gun. The momentum the series had been building comes to a sudden halt with the first two hours of this game being bad puzzle challenges and waiting for Alyx to open doors. After drudging through this first part of the game hungering for action, the game leaves you in pitch black darkness, forcing you to conserve flashlight charge. While interesting in concept, this led me to run into battle until my battery died and then retreat and wait for it to recharge. I never found myself feeling pressure to finish up the fight, because I was running low on battery, just tired of waiting. In fact, this whole game could be described as waiting. The last encounter in the game is an escort mission that you have to run four times. I hope that episode 2 builds on what Half-Life 2 created as opposed to destroying it.

Still to this day I feel this series has one of the most engaging story-lines ever put into a game, and HL2: Episode One is no exception. There is suspense and action to be sure, but surprisingly some very cool emotional attachment as well.

Steve on HL2: Episode 1
As you might expect, the second half of the Half-Life story, Half-Life 2, itself has a second half which also comes in two halves, not to be confused with the other halves of the second part of the first Half-Life. So, I'm looking at the first part of the of the second part, of the latter part, but not to be confused with the now available VR friendly third part...wait I've lost my train of thought... 
Ok, let me tell you where I am, if you've already bathed in the glory of digital mastery that is the predecessor to this episode, then read no further... and complete your journey to enlightenment. Obviously allowing for potentially a little enlightenment overclocking headroom, should episode 2 (the second instalment, of the second half, of the second game) be any good. HL2:E1 is an exquisite furthering of the story, and faithfully adheres to the standards set by the previous experience.  

Verdict: 9.7
'The first bit of the latter part of my minds second half, really enjoyed it.'

实话讲关卡设计的一般，V社关卡设计者的恶趣味也展现出来
增加的各种JUMP SCARE，各种行进道路上一定要让你手忙脚乱的东西
关卡指引上比2差很多，逻辑性相对差一些。解密元素角度很刁钻，有不少解密不死个一两次很难摸清。懵逼的时候很多，在管子里突然被炸断落地……满地跑的蚁狮和硬钢三脚机甲……
一半的时间都在黑暗狭窄的空间里面。

EP1里我体会到当年被我指挥蚁狮攻击的联合军，他们实在是太惨了
ALYX才是真正的反抗军领袖，我弗里曼就一个工具人。我听到最多的几句话就是
“真抱歉，如果我在你身边就好了”
“我很想帮你，可是你穿着HEV防护服。所以……”
“就这么定了！弗里曼博士你先！……”

虽说如此，但是我感觉弗里曼和ALYX简直越来越多的CP感啊
“虽然我已经尽了舔狗的一切，为我喜欢的女人（雾）和老丈人出生入死，但是我刚刚把门打开一半，她就自己跑了。陪伴我的，只有一堆联合军和一台三脚机甲”——戈登弗里曼

Well, not much to say about this one, its like, a quarter of the size of the original half life game. And it contains one of 2 bugs throughout the entire series, you get out of a train, but alyx doesn't. And alyx needs to be present. but they are still in the train, twiddling their thumbs. I got it fixed soon enough, though, so i cant complain too much. In fact, in my opinion, there is too much alyx in this game, they make for a good character, but the AI is kinda dumb. I liked the dark area though.
